txt.en: You have discovered a servant from the household of Thornhope hiding in the ruins
You have escorted Máthild to safety
'I think I can make it from here!'
While searching the ruins of Thornhope for survivors, you find a clever servant who managed to avoid the Orcs.
While searching the ruins of Thornhope for survivors, you find a clever servant who managed to avoid the Orcs.\n\nYou should help the servant to safety.
Máthild is hiding near the Mead Hall of Thornhope.\n\nYou escort Máthild to safety.
'Well now, it has taken you long enough! Now that you have caused a stir with the Orcs, I can find my way out of this burnt husk of a town.'
Máthild is hiding near the Mead Hall of Thornhope.\n\nYou escort Máthild to safety.
Máthild is at Béortnoth's camp, outside of Thornhope.\n\nYou should speak with Máthild when you return to Béortnoth's camp.
'I must thank you again, [placeholder]. It is sad, really... Thane Béortnoth was always kind to me; now he is all but mad. Perhaps there is a way to bring sense back to him....'
Talk to Máthild at Béortnoth's camp.
